name: Codebase Rebranding Agent
description: Automates complete codebase rebranding with intelligent analysis and systematic replacement
longDescription: Uses Claude Agent SDK to execute a 6-step rebranding workflow: clone repository, analyze brand elements, generate rebranding plan, apply changes, validate deployment, and create new repository. Handles company names, domains, colors, assets, and repository creation with GitHub CLI integration.
author: Claude Agent SDK Team
